# hasUndoManager

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the document owns an undo manager object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var hasUndoManager: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you change the value of this property to NO and the document already owns an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager] object, the document removes the undo manager as an observer of undo-related notifications and then removes its reference to the object.

## Managing Undo and Redo Actions

- **undoManager**: The object that the document uses to support undo/redo operations.
